title: Passport maker De La Rue names Clive Vacher to top role
text:
Passport maker De La Rue names Clive Vacher to top role

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 02:26AM ET)

(Reuters) - Banknote and passport printer De La Rue Plc (L: ) on Monday named Clive Vacher as chief executive officer to replace Martin Sutherland, whose departure was announced in May after the company warned of a profit downturn for the year. The company, which last year lost the contract for Britain's new blue passports, said it was continuing with reorganizing the business into two divisions - currency and authentication.

Passport maker De La Rue names Clive Vacher to top role
description: Passport maker De La Rue names Clive Vacher to top role
